alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 06 at 3:12AM PST until February 06 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to around 35 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ to 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
